languages.text: {n}Электрожрецы срывают руки с командных панелей, раздирая о пробившие их колья. Пока тела их, контролируемые схизматикалями, наполняются сиянием Движущей силы, несчастным остается лишь в ужасе кричать и молить о скорой смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Электрожрецы срывают руки с командных панелей, раздирая о пробившие их колья. Пока тела их, контролируемые схизматикалями, наполняются сиянием Движущей силы, несчастным остается лишь в ужасе кричать и молить о скорой смерти.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Электрожрецы срывают руки с командных панелей, раздирая о пробившие их колья. Пока тела их, контролируемые схизматикалями, наполняются сиянием Движущей силы, несчастным остается лишь в ужасе кричать и молить о скорой смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Electro-Priests tear their hands away from the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is cry out in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

{n}The Electro-Priests tear their hands away from the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is cry out in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

{n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

{n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

{n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Elektropriester reißen ihre Hände von den Bedienfeldern, schlitzen sich das Fleisch an den Pfählen auf, mit denen sie durchbohrt wurden. Als das Strahlen der Antriebskraft ihre von den Abtrünnigen kontrollierten Körper durchströmt, können die armen Seelen nur entsetzt schreien und um einen baldigen Tod betteln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Elektropriester reißen ihre Hände von den Bedienfeldern, schlitzen sich das Fleisch an den Pfählen auf, mit denen sie durchbohrt wurden. Als das Strahlen der Antriebskraft ihre von den Abtrünnigen kontrollierten Körper durchströmt, können die armen Seelen nur entsetzt schreien und um einen baldigen Tod betteln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les électro-prêtres s'arrachent les mains des panneaux de commandes, déchirant leurs chairs des pieux qui les transperçaient. Alors que leurs corps, contrôlés schismatiquement, s'imprègnent de l'éclat de la Force Motrice, la seule chose que les malheureux peuvent faire, c'est hurler d'horreur et prier pour une mort rapide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les électroprêtres s'arrachent les mains des panneaux de commandes, déchirant leurs chairs des pieux qui les transperçaient. Alors que leurs corps, contrôlés schismatiquement, s'imprègnent de l'éclat de la Force Motrice, la seule chose que les malheureux peuvent faire, c'est hurler d'horreur et prier pour une mort rapide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}电僧把他们的手从控制面板上扯了下来，一部分肉体被钢桩撕裂。这些不幸之人的身体受到了分离者的控制，他们唯一能做的事情就只有惊恐尖叫，渴望能求得个痛快。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驭电祭司把他们的手从控制面板上扯了下来，一部分肉体被钢桩撕裂。这些不幸之人的身体受到了分离者的控制，他们唯一能做的事情就只有惊恐尖叫，渴望能求得个痛快。{/n}

languages.text: {n}エレクトロ・プリースト達がコマンドパネルから手を引きはがすと、体に突き刺さされていた杭で肉体が引き裂かれた。分離派にコントロールされた彼らの体には動力の輝きが宿っている。哀れな者達は恐怖で叫び、今すぐ殺してくれと懇願するしかできない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エレクトロ・プリースト達はコマンドパネルから手を引きはがし、体を突き刺さす杭で肉は引き裂かれた。分裂にコントロールされた彼らの体には動力の輝きが宿っていて、その可哀想な者達は恐怖で叫び、「今すぐ殺してくれ」と懇願するしかできない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Electrosacerdotes se arrancan las manos de los paneles de mando, desgarrándose la carne en las estacas que los atraviesan. A medida que sus cuerpos, controlados por el cisma, se impregnan del resplandor de la Fuerza Motriz, lo único que pueden hacer los desdichados es gritar de horror y suplicar una muerte rápida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Electrosacerdotes se arrancan las manos de los paneles de mando, desgarrándose la carne en las estacas que los atraviesan. A medida que sus cuerpos, controlados por el cisma, se impregnan del resplandor de la Fuerza Motriz, lo único que pueden hacer los desdichados es gritar de horror y suplicar una muerte rápida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elektro Rahipler, ellerini komuta panelinden koparırcasına ayırıyor. Ellerini delip geçen kazıklar, etlerini parçalıyor. Bölücülerin hâkimiyetindeki bedenleri Devinim Gücü'nün parıltısıyla dolarken zavallıların yapabildiği tek şey, dehşet içinde çığlık atıp hızlı bir ölüm dilenmek oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elektro Rahipler, ellerini komuta panelinden koparırcasına ayırıyor. Ellerini delip geçen kazıklar, etlerini parçalıyor. Bölücüler tarafından kontrol edilen bedenlerine Devinim Gücü'nün aydınlığı bahşediliyor. Zavallılar o an dehşet içinde çığlık atıp hızlı bir ölüm için yakarıyorlar.{/n}
